title: EEG Processor - remove_artifacts Stage
description: Remove artifacts using Independent Component Analysis (ICA) or EOG regression. Supports multiple methods: ICA with automatic classification (ICALabel), or regression-based blink correction following Gratton & Coles (1983).

method.description: Artifact removal method. 'ica': Independent Component Analysis for multiple artifact types. 'regression': EOG regression for blink-focused correction (faster, deterministic).

n_components.description: Number of ICA components to compute (ICA method only). Use 15-20 for typical datasets.

ica_method.description: ICA decomposition algorithm (ICA method only). 'infomax': Robust, widely used. 'picard': Faster convergence.

eog_channels.description: EOG channel names for artifact detection. Required for regression method. Auto-detected if null. Example: ['HEOG', 'VEOG'].

ecg_channels.description: ECG channel names for cardiac artifact detection (ICA method only). Auto-detected if null.

subtract_evoked.description: For Epochs with regression method: subtract evoked response before fitting (Gratton & Coles 1983). Preserves ERPs while removing blinks. Ignored for Raw data.

show_plot.description: Display before/after comparison plots (regression method only).

plot_duration.description: Duration of comparison plot in seconds (regression method, Raw data only).

plot_start.description: Start time for comparison plot in seconds (regression method, Raw data only).

auto_classify.description: Enable automatic ICA component classification using ICALabel (ICA method only).

use_arci.description: Use ARCI (Automatic Removal of Cardiac Interference) for cardiac artifacts (ICA method only).

muscle_threshold.description: ICALabel threshold for muscle artifact components (ICA method only).

eye_threshold.description: ICALabel threshold for eye artifact components (ICA method only).

heart_threshold.description: ICALabel threshold for cardiac artifact components (ICA method only).

line_noise_threshold.description: ICALabel threshold for line noise components (ICA method only).

arci_cardiac_freq_range.description: Cardiac frequency range in Hz for ARCI detection (ICA method only).

arci_regularity_threshold.description: ARCI regularity threshold for cardiac component detection (ICA method only).

plot_components.description: Plot ICA component topographies and time courses (ICA method only).

enable_manual.description: Enable manual component selection GUI (ICA method only).

decim.description: Decimation factor for ICA fitting (ICA method only). Higher values = faster but less accurate.

random_state.description: Random seed for reproducibility (ICA method only).

verbose.description: Verbosity level. true/false for enable/disable, or MNE verbosity string.

then.description: EOG channels are required when using regression method.

examples.description: EOG regression for epoched ERP data (Gratton & Coles)
